channel.title: [HELP WILL REP+] Hybrid PVP SOURCE NPCDROPS.cfg [HELP WILL REP+]
channel.description:
So I try to edit drops and I don't understand how to make a tormented demon drop dclaws with a drop rate of 3%, there is currently no drops for a tormented demon. I know how to do it on a 317 but 602's are new to me. Please Help! Thanks,
AtomicPK Owner Kenny!
